snippet: Capt. Florent Groberg threw himself at a man with explosives in Afghanistan in 2012, absorbing the blast and preventing a deadlier attack.
abstract: Pres Obama awards Medal of Honor to Capt Florent A Groberg, who saved dozens of American and Afghan lives in 2012 by pushing suicide bomber away from group of people he was protecting; Groberg is only 10th living recipient of Medal of Honor from actions during war in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Capt. Florent Groberg threw himself at a man with explosives in Afghanistan in 2012, absorbing the blast and preventing a deadlier attack.

headline.main: Medal of Honor Awarded to Army Captain Who Tackled Bomber in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Seeing a Suicide Bomber, He Ran Directly at Him

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
